archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1081
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As an Owner customer with ENDUSER accounts that I am responsible for I want to easily complete settings for my end user accounts (notifications of renewal, overage, permissions etc (send notification to me or send notication to 021XXXXXX etc), so that I can manage what services they can access

properties.value: SC: Roles and privileges can be configured during implementation, not by end users themselves. "Owner customer account" - admin - can create subscription users, change their data (including those influencing notifications) and assigne one of pre-configured roles to them. PIM/TUM/BR: OOTB Owner can assign role out of predefined roles to the user and can grant to the user access to particular sunscription CNS: notification settings excamples ignored here (require decomposition)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
